name: Oderon Tactics
description:
Oderon Tactics is a turn-based tactical game inspired by MMORPGs. You play as a 5-man group, using the traditional tank/healer/DPS trinity, to fight against a boss and a few trash mobs on each level. Bosses have specific strats you have to adapt to, while still managing the pesky mobs harassing your healer.

The characters have a fixed set of 5 abilities, inspired by MOBA, and most of them have specific gimmicks to try to make them interesting (an undead barbarian leeches health to survive, a mad plague doctor throws potions that may land on the wrong tile and damage your characters, a lich steals health from allies to power his spells, etc...).
